sentences.sentence: Once destroyed, brain cells do not regenerate.
sentences.translation: 脑细胞一旦遭到破坏，就不能再生。

sentences.sentence: Nerve cells have limited ability to regenerate if destroyed.
sentences.translation: 神经细胞如果被破坏其再生能力有限。

sentences.sentence: She says: "I believe that the day is not far off when we will be able to prescribe drugs that cause severed spinal cords to heal, hearts to regenerate and lost limbs to regrow."
sentences.translation: 她说：“我相信，我们能够开出药方，让切断的脊髓愈合、心脏再生、失去的四肢再生的那一天不远了。”
